prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with vibrant blue feathers and a striking yellow beak.
Imagine a bird Pokemon that dives underwater to catch fish with its long bill.
Design a Pokemon resembling a seabird with a sleek body and playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in coastal habitats, known for its agility and speed.
Generate a creature that can adapt to both urban and natural environments, with a colorful appearance.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique feeding style, using its beak to catch prey.
Give me a whimsical blue bird Pokemon that is known for its comedic antics.
